text: rea ca yon khwam klaw kheapi nı hawcı khxng brrda phu thi ptiseth sraththa hela nan neuxngcak kar thi phwk khea hı mi pha khi kæ xallxhˌ sung sing thi phraxngkh midi thrng prathan hlakthan dı «ma yunyan nı sing nan læa thi xyu khxng phwk khea khux khumnrk chang lew ray cring «sung thi xyu khxng brrda phu xthrrm
